Name: DaVinCo
About the game: A picture is worth a thousand words - then how much more could you tell others through your 3D data in a virtual environment? Meet with friends/colleagues/partners online and put your 3D data front and center. Host or join a multi-user session to present and discuss your 3D results - easily, collaboratively, intuitively. DaVinCo is intendet to be ... - a modern way to present individual 3d data sets in virtual space. - an easy way to host/join collaborative meeting spaces. - an intuitive way of communication - visuell, auditiv, textuell. - an extensive way due to its wide range of file formats. - a flexible way to upload session 3D data - URL, host upload. - a versatile way to move, rotate, scale, measure, label. - a reliably way to load and store session states. DaVinCo is meant to be for ... - scientists who want to discuss their results in 3D. - students who look for a virtual learning environment. - AND anyone else who needs more than pure video conferencing.
